title: Any Idea What Serif Font This Is?
content:
First time posting so excuse me if I leave anything out. I need to design around an awful logo I was given and am having a hard time matching the font 100%. I get close, but the "y" is always the downfall. Any help is appreciated. Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017041046im_/http:/typophile.com/files/lynneslogo_6077.jpg)
author: eyetrip

comments.content: Looks like [Bookman](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017041046/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/Bookman/fonts/) to me, may be a bit stretched. I strongly encourage you to go with [Bookmania](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017041046/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/bookmania/), beautiful revival of Bookman by Mark Simonson.
